name: One DEAD Pixel
description:
ONE DEAD PIXEL:

If you fall... you are...
One DEAD pixel!

Controls:

Left Arrow: Move Left

Right Arrow: Move Right

Up Arrow: Jump

Written in a few hours using only JavaScript (no libraries or engines) 

Speedruns welcome!

Bugs: Jump height in Firefox is too short (Chrome required for now)

Music: DadHatTony "Matrix XP"

Git Repo: https://github.com/LiamOsler/platformer
